name: EUROSIF A.I.S.B.L (EUROPEAN SUSTAINABLE INVESTMENT FORUM)
membership: The GSIA - formed with other regional Sustainable Investment Forums (SIF in the US, SIO in Canada, RIAA in Australia). More info: http://www.gsi-alliance.org/
goal: Eurosif is the leading pan-European sustainable and responsible investment (SRI) membership organisation whose mission is to promote sustainability through European financial markets. Eurosif works as in partnership with Europe-based national Sustainable Investment Forums (SIFs), and with the direct support of their network which spans more than 400 Europe-based organisations drawn from the sustainable investment industry value chain. These organisations include institutional investors, asset managers, financial services, index providers and ESG research and analysis firms, totalling over €8 trillion in assets. Eurosif is also a founding member of the Global Sustainable Investment Alliance, the alliance of the largest SIFs around the world. The main activities of Eurosif are public policy, research and creating platforms for nurturing sustainable investing best practices.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market
euInitiatives:
Eurosif follows several key topics at an EU policy level including:
- Non-Financial & Diversity Disclosure Directive
- the Capital Markets Union Action Plan
- Regulatory technical standards about PRIIPs KID
- the PANA Committee of Inquiry
- the STS Securisation framework
